name: nestareas
description: A simple way to manage the common areas within NEST - Nuovo Studentato Trento

scripts.installDB: dropdb --if-exists se2proj && createdb -h localhost se2proj && psql -h localhost -q -d se2proj < ./sql/install.sql
scripts.installDB-Win: psql -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS se2proj; CREATE DATABASE se2proj;"

author: Francesco Arrighi, Federica Belotti, Claudio Facchinetti, Federica Ress, Guixia Zhu
